Articles.Content:
Since .25 came out i have been working on a fair few new craft and thought i should share a couple of the ones i have completed.

This thread will be dedicated to all things that are not made to go to space (planes, VTOLs, things that blow the space centre to pieces, that kinda stuff)

Titan Hunter mk1: Part count 102

Description:

This plane very easy to fly no SAS required, stable at any altitude and capable of 20km+ flights at 1500m/s

at low altitudes very maneuverable and very predictable without any SAS control needed to correct stalling (just let go of the controls)

Download link:

http://www./download/1zbnydysbz9e8g0/Titan+Hunter+mk1.craft

Hyper Beast mk1: Part count 216

Description:

Hyper for Hypersonic, this plane is capable of 2100+m/s at 26km and it gets there fast, you can easily get into space (not orbit) if you want it to go there (i have had it to 110km so far). SAS recommended but not necessary for hypersonic flight, at low altitudes it is still quite a maneuverable plane and very stable no SAS required.

Download link:

http://www./download/7s877m46rx78s5l/Hyper+Beast+mk1.craft

HA Mongrel mk3: part count 361

Description:

This plane was designed to do one thing well, fly in the upper atmosphere, it will fly at a comfortable 35,000m at 2300m/s in a sub orbit, capable of circumnavigating kerbin more than once (Up to 5 times without refueling) while being very stable, easy to fly and quite maneuverable.

Download link:

http://www./download/lc7ppbu6saf5tow/HA+Mongrel+mk3.craft

Feel free to leave a comment letting me know what you think of my work.

Edited October 10, 2014 by Roflcopterkklol
